com.communote.server.api.core.security.permission

Interface PermissionManagement<T,N,E extends AuthorizationException>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    NotePermissionManagement, TopicPermissionManagement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasePermissionManagement, NotePermissionManagementImpl, TopicPermissionManagementImpl

    public interface PermissionManagement<T,N,E extends AuthorizationException>
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Summary

      Adds a filter to the internal list of filters.

      Returns a collection of permissions for the given entity.

    • Method Detail

      • addPermissionFilter

        void addPermissionFilter(PermissionFilter<T,N> filter)
        Adds a filter to the internal list of filters.
        Parameters:
        filter - The filter to add.

      • getPermissions

        Set<Permission<T>> getPermissions(Long entityId)
        Returns a collection of permissions for the given entity.
        Parameters:
        entityId - ID of the entity
        Returns:
        Collection of permissions for the given entity.

      • getPermissions

        Set<Permission<T>> getPermissions(T entity)
        Returns a collection of permissions for the given entity.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity.
        Returns:
        Collection of permissions for the given entity.

      • getPermissionsForCreation

        Set<Permission<T>> getPermissionsForCreation(N entity)
        Returns a collection of permissions for creation for the given entity.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity, can be TO or null to check in general
        Returns:
        Collection of permissions for the given entity.

      • hasAndGetWithPermission

        <R> R hasAndGetWithPermission(long entityId,
                              Permission<T> permission,
                              Converter<T,R> converter)
                       throws E extends AuthorizationException,
                              NotFoundException
        Checks the permission and returns the given entity converted with the provided converter if the current user has the requested permission.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the target type of the conversion
        Parameters:
        entityId - ID of the entity
        permission - The permission the user must have.
        converter - the converter to convert the result
        Returns:
        The entity.
        Throws:
        E - in case the current user doesn't have the given permission.
        NotFoundException - in case the entity does not exist
        E extends AuthorizationException

      • hasPermission

        boolean hasPermission(long entityId,
                      Permission<T> permission)
        Checks if the current user has the permission of the given entity.
        Parameters:
        entityId - ID of the entity
        permission - The permission to check.
        Returns:
        True, if the user has the permission on the entity.

      • hasPermission

        boolean hasPermission(long entityId,
                      String permissionIdentifier)
        Checks if the current user has the permission of the given entity.
        Parameters:
        entityId - ID of the entity
        permissionIdentifier - The permission to check.
        Returns:
        True, if the user has the permission on the entity.

      • hasPermissionForCreation

        boolean hasPermissionForCreation(Permission<T> permission)
        Checks if the current user has the permission to to create entities of the associated type
        Parameters:
        permission - The permission to check.
        Returns:
        True, if the user has the permission for creating entities

      • removePermissionFilter

        void removePermissionFilter(PermissionFilter<T,N> filter)
        Removes a filter from the internal list of filters.
        Parameters:
        filter - The filter to remove.
